entry.title: Monday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then flurries at times heavy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
